ComicInfo.Summary: The Pilot Season Winner is Back! As the members of Cyberforce lay dying from a fatal techno-virus, their only hope for surival is their teammate Velocity. Carin Taylor has never been more in need of her super-speed as the races around the globe, trying to find and cure her teammates before the same virus kills her. The issue continues the inaugural creative union of writer Ron Marz (Witchblade, Angelus) and artist Kenneth Rocafort (Cyberforce/Hunter-Killer).
ComicInfo.Title: Decoys, Part 2
